featured.text: Coconut water, which contains salt and carbohydrates, is also more functional than water at restoring and maintaining a normal fluid 26 after exercise.
They also contain a very large amount of processed coconut oil, which is even worse than lard.

definition.zh_def: 椰子，一種熱帶水果，外殼硬，內部含有液體和可食用的果肉。
definition.en_def: A coconut is a tropical fruit with a hard shell that contains liquid and edible flesh inside.
definition.example: She drank the fresh coconut water on the beach.
